description: Recipient information for lab result report (LNO) records.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the LNO record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: RCPNT_ORDER_ID
columns.description: Stores the order record for which a report will be printed or has printed for the given recipient.

columns.name: RECIPIENT_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the report's recipient type.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Authorizing Provider


Primary Care Physician


CC Provider


CC Employee


Free text CC


Submitter


Department


Patient


Patient/Source


CC Submitter


Ordering Provider

columns.name: RECIPIENT_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the status of the report which will be printed or has printed for the given recipient.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Ready


Replaced


Printed - Ad hoc


Printed - Auto


Patient not discharged


Report not final


Printed - Manually


Delayed Recipient


Hold


Hold - Resolved


Paper report skipped: Suppressed by recipient setup


Message sent


Message sent: Extension


Recipient Removed


Message initiated


Message not sent: Submitter ineligible


Message not sent: Verification status ineligible


Message not sent: Result not reportable


Message not sent: Result source ineligible


Message not sent: Resulting agency ineligible


Message not sent: CC submitters ineligible


Message not sent: Miscellaneous failure


Message not sent: Order not linked to patient


Message not sent: Order group not ready


Message not sent: Custom interface filter


Message not sent: Consent not given


Message not sent: Interface only sends Final and Corrected


Message not sent: Interface only sends Prelim, Final, and Corrected


Message not sent: interface only sends In Process, Prelim, or Final


Message not sent: CC submitter cancel won't be sent


Message not sent: Parent orders aren't sent


Message not sent: Interface only sends electronic cancer checklists


Message not sent: Interface canceled orders aren't sent


Message not sent: Performable cancels aren't sent


Message not sent: Order suppressed


Message initiated: Sending pending results


Message not sent: Ineligible interface


Message not sent: Order filtered by rule


Message not sent: Network orders aren't sent


Message not sent: Interface does not send unsolicited cancels

columns.name: RECIPIENT_EVNT_INST
columns.description: Stores the instant this line was added to the recipient's table.

columns.name: RCPT_RRT_SUB_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the sub type of the report.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


End of Week Report


Final Summary Report

columns.name: RCPNT_TYPE_DEP_ID
columns.description: Stores the department record if the recipient is the department.

columns.name: RCPNT_TYPE_SMT_ID
columns.description: Stores the submitter record if the recipient is the submitter.

columns.name: RCPNT_TYPE_SMT_ID_RECORD_NAME
columns.description: The name of the submitter record.

columns.name: RCPNT_TYPE_SER_ID
columns.description: Stores the provider record if the recipient is the provider.

columns.name: RCPNT_TYPE_RQG_ID
columns.description: Stores the patient/source record if the recipient is a non enterprise patient.

columns.name: RCPNT_TYPE_EMP_ID
columns.description: Stores the employee record if the recipient is the employee.

columns.name: RCPNT_TYPE_FREE_TXT
columns.description: Stores the free text name of the recipient.

columns.name: RCPNT_HOLD_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The recipient hold type category number for the recipient.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


City mismatch

columns.name: RCPNT_HOLD_OVT_LN
columns.description: Contains the recipient hold test (OVT) line.

columns.name: RCPNT_HOLD_BSDON_C_NAME
columns.description:
Contains the recipient hold based on address category.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Physician


Agency


Patient


Provider


Submitter

columns.name: RCPNT_HOLD_QUAL_LN
columns.description: Contains the recipient hold rule qualifier line.

columns.name: RCPNT_RSLN_C_NAME
columns.description:
The recipient hold resolution category number for the recipient.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Ignore


Added Recipient

columns.name: RCPNT_RSLN_INST
columns.description: Contains the recipient hold resolution instant.

columns.name: RCPNT_RSLN_USER_ID
columns.description: Contains the recipient hold resolution user.

columns.name: RCPNT_RSLN_LINE
columns.description: Contains the line in the related group for the recipient hold resolution instant that audits the chosen CC recipient

columns.name: RCPNT_LPP_ID
columns.description: Stores the programming point which added this recipient

columns.name: RCPNT_LPP_ID_LPP_NAME
columns.description: The name of the extension.

columns.name: RCPNT_RPTBL_RULE_YN
columns.description:
Indicates if the recipient on the row was added because of a reportable rule.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: RCPNT_CORRECTED_RPT
columns.description: If the report on the row was sent to a health agency based on a reportable rule, and the results later change such that it is no longer reportable to the health agency, this item stores the row in the LNO_LAB_RECIP_INFO table that contains the corrected report.

columns.name: RESEND_EMP_ID
columns.description: The ID of the user who resent the message. Messages sent over an interface may sometimes fail to deliver and would need to be resent. This column will have a value only for resent messages.

columns.name: RESEND_RELATED_LN
columns.description: The line number of the associated recipient's record. This points to the recipient line of the interface message that was resent. Messages sent over an interface may sometimes fail to deliver and would need to be resent. This column will have a value only for resent messages.

columns.name: RESEND_REASON_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category number of the reason for resending an interface message. Messages sent over an interface may sometimes fail to deliver and would need to be resent. This column will have a value only for resent messages.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Others

columns.name: RESULT_TRGR_LPP_ID
columns.description: The ID of the extension that triggered the result. This column will have a value only for those results that were triggered by a post event extension set up to send results over an interface.

columns.name: RESULT_TRGR_LPP_ID_LPP_NAME
columns.description: The name of the extension.

columns.name: WHO_REMOV_RECPNT_ID
columns.description: The user ID of the user who removed this recipient from result reports.

columns.name: RECPNT_REMOV_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category number of the reason for which this recipient was removed from result reports.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: RCPNT_OVRD_DEV_ID
columns.description: The record ID of the override device that the recipient is to use when the report prints.

columns.name: RCPNT_OVRD_DEV_ID_PRINT_DEVICE_NAME
columns.description: The printer name.

columns.name: RCPNT_OVRD_FAX_NUM
columns.description: The override fax number that the recipient is to use when the report prints.

columns.name: RCPNT_RPTBL_RULE_ID
columns.description: This item stores the record ID for the reporting rule that caused the recipient to be added.

columns.name: RCPNT_RPTBL_RULE_ID_RULE_NAME
columns.description: The name of the reporting rule.
